definition: a diversion/a feint attack to mislead the enemy
disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: So as long as the devil is hiding the details, the question remains.
sentences.chinese: 只要这样的魔鬼故布疑阵，问题就会始终存在。

definition: troops deployed to mislead the enemy
to lure the tiger from its domain in the mountains (idiom)/to lure an enemy away from his territory
lit. to pull a snake from its hole/to expose a malefactor (idiom)
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
to hinder the eyesight/(fig.) to trick into not noticing/to blindfold
to fall into a trap/taken in by a stratagem/cheated/ripped off
